Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides that certain entities may not require a person to provide a copy of his or her criminal history record under certain circumstances
Summary: Provides that certain entities may not require a person to provide a copy of his or her criminal history record under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง296, Exec L; amd ยง313, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the education law, in relation to prohibiting mandatory disclosure of a criminal history record in certain circumstances
